product.title: Always Picked First Embroidered Patch
product.description: It just can't be helped. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an enamel pin. Size: 3.5" Color: Black
product.descriptionHtml:
It just can't be helped. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

This design is also available as an enamel pin. 

Size: 3.5"

Color: Black
